rev.desc.rev.desc: Removed the following expression from the 'save.contents' panel:
if ($L.dd.reclist=2) then ($L.dd.reclist=1)
This will prevent the list pane from refreshing every time a different record is selected from the list.
QC8467 - Attempting to use "expand array" on a Affected Ci's in Change Management - Could possibly be renamed to "Data Corruption Wizard".
Removed the panel "edit.array" of type "edit.array"
Removed the exists to the panel "edit.array" from the following panels:
- display.options
Hua: replace hard coded string with scmsg
Panel next.record
Changed normal exit from call.fc.disp to save.contents
Panel prev.record
Changed normal exit from call.fc.disp to save.contents
on panel save.contents added the expression $L.void=fduplicate($L.target.0, $L.target)
on panel call.fc.update added $L.target.0 as the save copy of database record.
Modified the process line on reset.reclist.ff to:
if (nullsub(sysinfo.get("reclist"), false) and $L.many) then ($L.dd.reclist=1) else ($L.dd.reclist=0)
Before, the statement was $L.dd.reclist=1 which hard-coded the reset regardless of how many records were in the initial list.
Made modification to handle trigger error on update.
See document named CenterPointTicket128670.doc attached to CenterPoint for details of what was done.
Fixed typo on message panel.
Added split screen functionality.
Changed so a title can be passed in.
scmsg

descript.descript: Removed the following expression from the 'save.contents' panel:
if ($L.dd.reclist=2) then ($L.dd.reclist=1)
This will prevent the list pane from refreshing every time a different record is selected from the list.
QC8467 - Attempting to use "expand array" on a Affected Ci's in Change Management - Could possibly be renamed to "Data Corruption Wizard".
Removed the panel "edit.array" of type "edit.array"
Removed the exists to the panel "edit.array" from the following panels:
- display.options
Hua: replace hard coded string with scmsg
Panel next.record
Changed normal exit from call.fc.disp to save.contents
Panel prev.record
Changed normal exit from call.fc.disp to save.contents
Made the following changes as per recomendation of Mike P.
in us.fill.display
on panel save.contents added the expression $L.void=fduplicate($L.target.0, $L.target)
on panel call.fc.update added $L.target.0 as the save copy of database record.
Modified the process line on reset.reclist.ff to:
if (nullsub(sysinfo.get("reclist"), false) and $L.many) then ($L.dd.reclist=1) else ($L.dd.reclist=0)
Before, the statement was $L.dd.reclist=1 which hard-coded the reset regardless of how many records were in the initial list.
Made modification to handle trigger error on update.
See document named CenterPointTicket128670.doc attached to CenterPoint for details of what was done.
Fixed typo on message panel.
Added split screen functionality.
Changed so a title can be passed in.
scmsg
